001package org.biopax.validator.api;
002
003import java.util.Arrays;
004
005/**
006 * A validation runtime exception.
007 *
008 * @author rodche
009 */
010public class ValidatorException extends RuntimeException {
011        private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
012
013  private final Object[] msgArgs;
014
015    public ValidatorException(String msg, Object... args) {
016        super(msg);
017      msgArgs = args;
018    }
019    
020    public ValidatorException(Throwable t, Object... args) {
021      super(t);
022      msgArgs = args;
023    }
024    
025    public Object[] getMsgArgs() {
026                return msgArgs;
027        }
028
029    @Override
030    public String toString() {
031        return super.toString() + Arrays.toString(msgArgs);
032    }
033    
034}
